title.en: Maxed-Out Luck Overpower — The Unluckiest Adventurer Becomes the Strongest Through Reversed Stats!

altTitles.ja: 運カンスト無双~不幸すぎる冒険者、ス テータス逆転で最強に~

altTitles.ja-ro: Un Kansuto Musou ~ Fukou Sugiru Boukensha, Status Gyakuten de Saikyou ni ~

description.en:
"On that day, a miraculous event struck the ‘most unlucky man in the world.’"

Fukutaro Kamisaki's life had always been abandoned by luck. Far from happiness, constantly used by his companions, he was ultimately cursed by an evil god with the worst "Disaster Skill."

However, due to the effect of this Disaster Skill: Grand Reversal, all of his stats were completely flipped — and only his "Luck" skyrocketed to an insane level.

In an instant, he became the adventurer with the highest luck stat in the world, and now, together with a down-on-her-luck goddess, he takes on the divine trials created by the gods — the dungeons!

title.en: Hatsu Kano, Hatsu Kare, Hatsu Ren'ai

altTitles.ja: 初カノ初カレ初レンアイ

altTitles.en: First Girlfriend, First Boyfriend, First Love

description.en:
Inoue's girlfriend is a tomboy to the extreme!

Published in Young King 2019 No. 13.

title.en: Munou wa Fuyou to Iware "Tokei Tsukai" no Boku wa Shokunin Guild kara Oidasareru mo, Dungeon no Shinbu de Shin mo Chikara ni Kakusei suru

altTitles.ja: 無能は不要と言われ『時計使い』の僕は職人ギルドから追い出されるも、ダンジョンの深部で真の力に覚醒する THE COMIC

altTitles.en: As a Watchmaker, I Was Kicked Out of the Craftsman's Guild Because My Incompetence Was Deemed Unnecessary, but I Awakened to My True Power in the Depths of the Dungeon

description.en: In a world where skills are supreme, Shikuro is given the incompetent skill of "clock-user". One day, Shikuro, who is looked down upon by others, is accused of rape and sent to the frontier, where he is pushed down a hole that leads to a dungeon's deepest level. In the depths of his desperate situation, he thought to himself, "If only I could use my clock-user ability to stop my stomach clock as well. Then the hunger would stop." This triggered the awakening of his skill "clock-user". Eventually, he makes full use of his abilities and is recognized as an SSS-class adventurer--.
description.ja: 神に与えられたスキルによって、絶対的な評価がされる世界。その中で『時計使い』という無能なスキルを与えられてしまった少年・シクロ。厳しい境遇でも懸命に暮らしていたが、貴族の卑劣な罠によって犯罪奴隷として辺境送りの刑に処されてしまう。そして、辺境では冒険者達の荷物持ちをさせられ、道中の悪質な遊びにより、ダンジョンの奈落へと落とされることに――。奈落には凶悪なモンスター達が溢れシクロは死を覚悟したが、自分を陥れた者達への強い復讐の意思から、『時計使い』のスキルを真の実力へ昇華させる！

title.en: Saving the World Through a Game

altTitles.ja: ゲームで世界を救います

description.en:
Shugo Gento, who has just retired, finds himself in urgent need of a large sum of money due to family circumstances. To earn it, he joins Melloworld, a virtual game that promises real-world profits.

Inside the game, Shugo teams up with Ayana Himekawa, a popular streamer, and Hikaru Morioka, a wealthy player. The trio progresses smoothly at first, but gradually they begin to feel something is off about the game.

As they investigate to uncover the truth behind Melloworld, a shocking revelation comes to light: the game's post-apocalyptic world is actually a vision of the real world's future. Worse yet, a god-like entity controlling the game is guiding humanity toward that grim destiny.

Can they join forces to defeat this god and restore the world to its rightful path?

title.en: Seijo ja nakatta no de, Oukyuu de nonbiri Gohan wo Tsukuru koto ni shimashita

altTitles.en: I'm Not the Saint, so I'll Just Leisurely Make Food at the Royal Palace

altTitles.zh: 反正不是聖女在王宮裏悠閒地做飯好了

altTitles.ja: 聖女じゃなかったので、王宮でのんびりご飯を作ることにしました

description.en:
Rina was summoned to another world to be the Saint, but was surprised at how bad the food tasted. It tastes like this even at the royal palace…? I’ll just make it myself, so give me your kitchen! Relieved of her Saint duties, Rina wins the heart and stomachs of the nobles through her food!  
  
[alt. Raw](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/44992)

title.en: I Dominate the Apocalypse by Cultivating Immortality

description.en: Craft celestial-grade treasures from apocalyptic scraps, and roam the wastelands of the end times using immortal cultivation techniques. With a soul traversing two realms, truth and illusion blur… In the realm of the void, a frenzied path of cultivation begins!

title.en: Reincarnated as a Scumbag, I Use My Wife and Daughter to Prove Immortality

altTitles.zh: 转生渣男我带妻女证长生

description.en: A mighty Da Luo immortal, gravely wounded, descends to the mortal world and reincarnates into the body of the scumbag Jiang Tianchen. After a thousand years of being single, he encounters a gang trying to assault his wife and take his daughter — so he beats them down without mercy! If they’re dark, he’s darker! Anyone who comes will be drained dry, turning all enemies into cultivation resources for him, his wife, and his daughter on their path to immortality!

altTitles.ja: スマイリー

altTitles.vi: Smiley - Cười lên

description.en: Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
description.ru:
Томодзи Камомэ — писатель-фрилансер, потерявший любимую дочь в результате несчастного случая. В отчаянии от него уходит жена, и он проводит свои дни в одиночестве, закрывшись от внешнего мира.
Однако однажды листовка странной религиозной группы «Общество смеющегося сердца» меняет его судьбу. В ней он увидел свою жену, с которой потерял связь...
description.vi: Yuji Kamome, một nhà báo tự do đã mất đi đứa con gái yêu quý của mình trong một vụ tai nạn. Trong cơn tuyệt vọng, vợ anh cũng đã rời bỏ anh, để mặc anh trải qua những tháng ngày trống rỗng. Tuy nhiên, một ngày nọ, một tờ rơi từ một giáo phái kỳ lạ mang tên "Tâm Tiếu Hội" tìm đến và thay đổi số phận của anh. Và trong bức ảnh trên tờ rơi đó anh đã nhận ra được người vợ đã biệt tăm biệt tích suốt thời gian qua của mình. Một câu chuyện về sự cuồng tín và điên rồ của con người. Thứ bóng tối tà đạo mà nụ cười ma quái đó đang mời gọi là gì?
description.pt-br: Yuushi Kamome, um escritor freelancer devastado pela perda de sua filha, é abandonado pela esposa e vive sem propósito. Um dia, ele recebe um panfleto da misteriosa "Sociedade do Coração Sorridente" e, ao ver a imagem de sua esposa desaparecida, decide investigar. Assim, ele mergulha em um culto sombrio, onde fé e loucura se misturam, dando início a um suspense arrepiante sobre essa "nova religião".

title.en: Osoraku Kanojo wa Ore no Aniki wo Neratteru

altTitles.ja: おそらくカノジョは俺の兄貴を狙ってる

altTitles.en: She's Likely Aiming for My Older Brother

altTitles.pt-br: Ela provavelmente está mirando no meu irmão mais velho

altTitles.ja-ro: Osoraku Kanojo wa Ore no Aniki wo Neratteru

altTitles.ru: Ей наверняка нужен лишь мой старший брат

description.en:
A high school guy who doesn't trust girls anymore has been tricked too many times by girls who just wanted to get close to his good-looking older brother. After all that, he decides he’ll never trust a girl again.

But then, a pretty girl in his class suddenly starts talking to him a lot. Is she just trying to get to his brother too…? Or does she actually mean something else?

(Source: Manga Park, translated)
description.ja: 女性不信の男子高校生・遠野陽太。イケメンの兄貴と近づきたい女子たちに幾度となく利用され騙されてきた彼はもう二度と女性を信じないと決めていた。そんな中、やたらと陽太に話しかけてくるクラスの美少女・北条泉が現れて！？兄貴狙い…？気になる泉の心中とはーー。疑心暗鬼ラブコメディここに開幕☆
description.tr:
İyi görünümlü abisine yaklaşmak için kendisini pek çok kez kandıran kızlar yüzünden artık kızlara güvenmeyen bir lise öğrencisi. Bütün olanlardan sonra artık hiçbir kıza güvenmemeye karar veriyor.

Ama sonra sınıfındaki güzel bir kız bir anda onunla konuşmaya başlıyor. O da sadece abisine yakınlaşmaya mı çalışıyor...? Yoksa tamamen başka bir şeyi mi hedefliyor?
description.pt-br:
Um estudante do ensino médio que não confia mais em garotas foi enganado muitas vezes por garotas que só queriam se aproximar de seu belo irmão mais velho. Depois de tudo isso, ele decide que nunca mais confiará em uma garota.

Mas então, uma garota bonita da turma dele de repente começa a falar demais com ele. Será que ela está só tentando atingir o irmão dele também...? Ou será que ela quer dizer outra coisa?

altTitles.ja: 龍-RON-

description.en:
Kyouto, April 1928. Oshikouji Ryu is 17 years old, and is called 'Genius swordman, Dragon of Kyouto'. He will inherit the property of the noble Oshikouji family, but prefers practising Kendou. He enters a school for training Kendou swordman, but the seniors of school are very harsh and intolerable. But Ryu doesn't surrender and overcomes the problems, later on he impresses his seniors and they begin to like him.

This manga tells a great story against the richly textured background of historical Japan and China, it has a refined and excellent artwork. Murakami's views on Chinese and Korean people is very warm, and not those of the previous invader and governor such as the extreme right party in Japan. Another interesting part of the manga is its rich depiction of Japanese colorful life. A typical example of the realistic style and a manga of high reputation in Korea and Japan.

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Dai 4-shou—Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majo

altTitles.ja: Ｒｅ：ゼロから始める異世界生活　第四章　聖域と強欲の魔女

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 4: The Sanctuary and the Witch of Greed

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero - Capítulo 4: O Santuário e a Bruxa da Ganância

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть четвёртая: Святилище и ведьма жадности

altTitles.es: Re:Zero - Empezar de cero en un mundo diferente - Arco 4: El santuario y la bruja de la avaricia

altTitles.ja-ro: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Dai Yon-shou—Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majo

description.en: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...
description.es:
Decididos a liberar a Rem de un misterioso letargo, Subaru y Emilia emprenden un nuevo viaje hacia el Santuario en donde se enfrentarán a nuevos peligros que jamás imaginarían.

¡La esperada adaptación del arco 4 comienza aquí!
description.ja: 魔女教大罪司教『怠惰』を討伐し、エミリアとの再会を果たしたナツキ・スバル。辛い決別を乗り越えて和解した二人、しかし彼らには新たな波乱が待ち受けていて……。
description.ru: После победы над белым китом и архиепископом греха лени Петельгейзе, Субару наконец воссоединяется с Эмилией. Однако они узнают шокирующие новости, что на Круш с Рем по пути в столицу снова напал культ ведьмы. Круш потеряла свою память, а все воспоминания о Рем у людей были стёрты. Вместе с жителями деревни Субару решает вернуться обратно, однако деревня оказалась пустой. Оставшиеся жители, которые под руководством Рам отправились в так называемое "Святилище", до сих пор не вернулись. Что же там произошло?..

altTitles.ja: 高嶺の華は乱れ咲き

altTitles.vi: Nụ Hoa Trên Đỉnh Ngày Ấy Đã Nở Rồi!

description.en: She is the perfect student, beautiful, clever and with lots of friends… He is an ordinary boy in the class, staring at her from afar but one day he sees her in a very compromising situation! How will she react? The lives of these two will now intermingle with totally unexpected outcomes!
description.ja: 憧れのお嬢様は隠れマゾ!?　彼女の秘密を知った時淫靡な学園生活が幕を開ける……。
description.vi: Anh chàng trung bình main nam romcom cảm nắng chị hoa khôi xinh đẹp, thông minh, các thứ các thứvà chỉ biết ngắm nhìn từ phía xa... Nhưng rồi một hôm, anh main đã bắt gặp một cảnh tượng của chị main khiến anh ấy nghi ngờ nhân sinh quan?! Chị main sẽ phản ứng ra sao? Hai người đã va vào đời nhau như thế đấy. Vậy kết quả sẽ là dư lào đây?!

title.en: Inou Dousei ~ Hono'o to Ko'ori no Nouryokusha no Ba'ai

altTitles.ja: 『異能同棲～炎と氷の能力者の場合～』

altTitles.en: Superpower Cohabitation ~ The Case of the Pyromancer and Cryomancer

description.en: A story about a couple - a cryomancer and a pyromancer - living together.

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘　シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

title.en: You Don't Decrypt at All, Do You?

altTitles.zh-ro: Nin Wanquan Bu Jiemi Shi Ma?

description.en:
Google Translated:

The spooky game "Paradise" invades the real world, randomly selects humans to become players, and forces a live-action escape room game. As one of the players, the system prompted him that the game has no death rollback, cannot rebuild the trumpet, and does not have any customs clearance strategy, and if he wants to survive, he can only follow the game prompts to decrypt it with difficulty. Zhu Wen took out a match, and ten minutes later, everywhere he went, ghost NPCs were mourning, the game map was full of grass, and bugs were all over the ground.

title.en: It All Starts with Playing Game Seriously

altTitles.zh: 从认真玩游戏开始崛起

description.en:
even an ant can make a comeback in life, if he worked hard.Nothing is fated, you and i can both be a black horse. Game ( yuan world) descended in reality, player obtains character’s ability, the world hence gone into chaos. Hiding his intention to win but scared of dying Liu Yi reincarnated , first of all, he needs to start to take games seriously and overcome his fear and not be scared, so he can become a hero, and save the world. but will he be able to do that? find out more by reading it  
  
  
||  
One born as an ant out to have will and ambition. Fate has not yet been determined; each of us are a black horse. When the game [Yuan World] descended into reality, players gained the ability of their in-game characters. As such, the world became chaos. Liu Yi — forbearing, ambitious, yet afraid of fighting— time travels to an era before the game had become reality. Armed with the knowledge of the future, starting from the bottom to overcome his fear of fighting, Liu Yi rises up to the top, ultimately becoming the Savior and resolving the crisis of the apocalypse.||
description.pt-br: Até uma formiga pode voltar à vida, se trabalhar muito. O destino ainda não foi determinado; cada um de nós é um cavalo negro. Quando o jogo [Yuan World] se tornou realidade, os jogadores ganharam as habilidades de seus personagens no jogo. Como tal, o mundo se tornou um caos. Liu Yi, ambicioso, mas com medo de lutar, viaja no tempo para uma época anterior ao jogo se tornar realidade. Armado com o conhecimento do futuro, começando de baixo para superar seus medos, Liu Yi almeja subir ao topo, tornando-se finalmente o Salvador e resolvendo a crise do apocalipse. Mas ele será capaz de fazer isso?

description.en: Xu Qian traveled to a world where he could contract spirit beasts and obtained the status of a "corrector" during the journey. He awakened the system and contracted the first spirit beast, a space-time beast. After learning the meaning of the "corrector" identity, to prevent the invasion of other worlds, Xu Qian began to use the system to solve the alien world, to strengthen the system and his own spirit beasts.

description.fr: Un jeu sans règles ni protections ! Il est rempli d'un groupe d'individus fous en quête de pouvoir, de trésors et de survie. Le protagoniste, Qin Ran, qui est au bord de la mort, prend la décision déterminée d' y entrer - pour avoir une chance de rester en vie !
description.zh: 这是一款不受任何保护的地下游戏！充斥着一群追逐权利、财宝、生命的疯子…… 命不久矣的主角秦然，选择毅然进入其中——为了活下去的机会！

description.en: A global anomaly has occurred, and monsters have invaded. Monster trainers now bear the burden of saving human civilization. After Xiao Xingyu crosses over, he awakens the “God-tier Monster Training System”. By opening the Eye of the Demonic God, he can see through all hidden evolution paths of monsters, activate their hidden bloodlines, and unlock infinite evolution… A husky can evolve into the Hellhound! A fairy can mutate into the Twelve-Winged Blazing Angel! Hatching a dragon egg can summon the Nine-Spirited Candle Dragon!”

altTitles.ja: ロックは淑女の嗜みでして

altTitles.ja-ro: Rock wa Shukujo no Tashinami de shite

description.en: Ririsa Suzunomiya, who is forced to live a cramped life at a girl's school where genuine ladies gather, is drawn to the sounds coming from the old school building...? The gorgeous and ladylike girls shout with beautiful sparks!
description.ja: お嬢様たちが織りなす音楽は…ロック!? 全国のお嬢様が集う女学園にて、窮屈な生活を強いられている鈴ノ宮りりさは、旧校舎から聞こえてくる音に引き寄せられて…？華麗でお淑やかな少女たちが、美しく火花を散らしてシャウトする!!

altTitles.ja: 姫のためなら死ねる

altTitles.en: I Would Die for the Princess

description.en: The 27-year-old Sei Shonagon, depicted here as a sort of medieval NEET, manages to land a job as the private tutor of a beautiful and refined 13-year-old, Princess Teishi. There are also a number of other quirky court ladies, some of whom have their eyes on Shonagon.

altTitles.ja: 恋の奇跡

description.en: Chubby and plain, Taeko's biggest worry is whether she'll ever have the courage to tell her crush how she feels. Then one day a mysterious cousin comes to stay and Taeko's world is shattered. Cast out of her own home after her mother's death, Taeko stumbles into the night and is hit by a truck. When she wakes up, she's greeted by a doctor who promises to turn her life around. And thus begins a tale of revenge and intrigue that's a roller coaster of cracked out soap opera fun from start to finish.

title.en: Madogiwa henshuu to baka ni sareta ore ga, futago JK to doukyo suru koto ni natta

altTitles.en: Mocked as a sidelined editor, I ended up living together with a pair of twin high school girls.

altTitles.ja: 窓際編集とバカにされた俺が、双子ＪＫと同居することになった

altTitles.ja-ro: Madogiwa henshuu to baka ni sareta ore ga, futago JK to doukyo suru koto ni natta

description.en:
"If you let us stay... you can do naughty things with us."
Mitsuhiko Okaya, an unremarkable man, was betrayed by his wife and a junior colleague. At work, he was mocked as a useless editor and spiraled into despair, until one day before him appeared a pair of twin high school girls he shouldn’t know, yet somehow seemed familiar. The younger twin, Akari, was lively, cheerful, and always teasing him, while the elder twin, Nanako, was shy and clumsy, yet secretly a closet pervert. ..They were once his students from the cram school where he worked during his student days.
description.id:
"Kalau kamu membiarkan kami menginap... kamu boleh melakukan hal apapun ke kita."
Mitsuhiko Okaya, seorang pria biasa, dikhianati oleh istrinya dan kouhainya di kantor. Di tempat kerja, dia dihina sebagai editor tak berguna dan tenggelam dalam keputusasaan, sampai suatu hari di hadapannya muncul sepasang gadis kembar berseragam SMA yang seharusnya asing, tapi entah kenapa terasa familiar.  Si adik, Akari, ceria, aktif, dan suka menggoda dengan santai, sedangkan kakaknya, Nanako, pemalu dan canggung, tapi diam-diam mesum.  ...Mereka ternyata adalah mantan murid bimbelnya saat masa kuliah dulu.
description.ja:
『泊めてくれたら……えっちなことしてもいいよ』

冴えない岡谷光彦（おかやみつひこ）は
妻と後輩から裏切りを受けた。
会社では窓際編集とバカにされ自暴自棄になる光彦の前に
見知らぬはずの、だけどどこか見覚えのある双子JKが現れる。
積極的で気立ても良く、いつも気さくにからかってくる妹のあかりと、
控えめで不器用、だけど実はむっつりスケベな姉の菜々子。
……学生時代に働いていた塾の教え子だった。

title.en: Yuusha Party o Tsuihou Sareta Beast Tamer, Saikyou Shu Nekomimi Shoujo to Deau

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou Sareta Beast Tamer, Saikyou Shu Nekomimi Shoujo to Deau
Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou Sareta Beast Tamer, Saikyou Shuzoku Nekomimi Shoujo to Deau

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティーを追放されたビーストテイマー、最強種の猫耳少女と出会う
勇者パーティーを追放されたビーストテイマー、最強種族の猫耳少女と出会う

altTitles.ko: 용사 파티에서 추방당한 비스트 테이머, 최강종인 고양이귀 소녀와 만나다

altTitles.zh-hk: 被勇者隊伍開除的馭獸使、邂逅了最強種的貓耳少女

altTitles.en: The beast tamer who got kicked out from the hero party, meets a cat girl from the superior race.
The Beast Tamer Who Got Kicked Out from the Hero Party, Meets A Nekomimi Girl from the Superior Race

altTitles.zh-ro: Bèi yǒngzhě duìwǔ kāichú de yù shòu shǐ, xièhòule zuìqiáng zhǒng de māo ěr shàonǚ

altTitles.es: El Domador de Bestias Exiliado del Grupo

altTitles.vi: Luyện Thú Sư Sau Khi Bị Đuổi Khỏi Tổ Đội Của Dũng Sĩ, Gặp Được Thiếu Nữ Tai Mèo Của Chủng Tộc Mạnh Nhất

description.en: Because Rein was a weak and simple beast tamer, he was expelled from the hero's group but that didn't stop his desire to be an adventurer. By taking simple quests afterwards he has a destined encounter with a strong cat girl.
description.es: Debido a que Rein era un domador de bestias débil y simple, fue expulsado del grupo del héroe, pero eso no detuvo su deseo de ser un aventurero. Al realizar misiones simples después, tiene un encuentro destinado con una niña gata fuerte.
description.ja:
「小説家になろう」発。 ビーストテイマーと最強猫耳娘との出会いから始まる、絆を紡ぐファンタジー！ 動物を使役するビーストテイマーのレインは、勇者パーティーの一員として戦ってきた。しかし、他に取り柄のないレインは次第に戦いについていけなくなってしまう…。 「動物を使役するだけのキミは役立たず以外の何者でもない。クビだ」 ついに、パーティーを追放されてしまったレイン。これからは、世界を救うとか関係なく、自由に生きてみよう。そして冒険者になることを決意したレインは、「最強種」と呼ばれる猫霊族の少女と出会う──。 一方で、勇者のパーティーは気づいていなかった。今まで魔王軍と戦うことができたのは、レインの力によるものが大きいということに…。 これは、虐げられていたビーストテイマーが、運命の出会いを果たして、真の仲間と絆を紡ぐ物語。

- [WN Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8810eu/)
description.vi: Câu chuyện kể về Beast Tamer Rein, người bị trục xuất khỏi nhóm của các anh hùng, vì anh ta chỉ có khả năng điều khiển động vật. Anh trở thành một nhà thám hiểm và gặp một cô gái mèo, người thuộc loài mạnh nhất.
description.pt-br: O domador de feras Rein, que usa animais, era um membro do grupo do herói. No entanto, como não podia fazer mais nada, não conseguiu acompanhar o ritmo da batalha. “Você só sabe brincar com os animais. Está despedido’. Rein é expulso do grupo e agora vive livremente como um aventureiro. Em sua jornada, ele conhece uma garota de uma tribo de gatos, a chamada espécie mais forte. Por outro lado, o grupo do herói permanece inconsciente de que seu sucesso anterior foi tudo graças a Rein… Esta é a história de um domador de feras que não se segura mais e seu fatídico encontro com uma companheira preciosa.

altTitles.ja: 邪神ちゃんドロップキック

description.en:
Jashin-chan Dropkick is a violent slapstic comedy about a delusional gothic lolita, Yurine, who summons a demon girl with the tail of a cobra, Jashin-chan.
They'll have to live together until Yurine finds a way to send Jashin-chan back to hell, or until Jashin-chan kills Yurine.

---

[Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20484)
description.ja:
魔界の悪魔、通称「邪神ちゃん」は、ある日突然、人間界に召喚されてしまう。
彼女を召喚したのは、神保町のボロアパートで暮らす、ちょっとブラックな心を持つ女子大生、花園ゆりねだった。しかもゆりねは、邪神ちゃんを魔界に帰す方法がわからないと言う。仕方なく一緒に暮らし始めた邪神ちゃんとゆりね。しかし、召喚者が死ねば魔界に帰れることから邪神ちゃんはゆりねを……!?
少女と邪神ちゃんが繰り広げるちょっとキケンな同居生活コメディ！
description.pt-br:
Jashin-chan Dropkick é uma comédia violenta sobre uma lolita gótica, Yurine, que invoca uma garota demônio com um rabo de cobra, Jashin-chan.
Elas terão que viver juntas até que Yurine encontre uma maneira de enviar Jashin-chan de volta ao inferno, ou até que Jashin-chan mate Yurine.

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

description.en: Suzu Yotsuya is a high school girl who loves to eat. While eating by herself in the cafeteria like usual, she is invited to eat with Majima-san, a tall and popular classmate. However, there are some suspicious rumors going around about Majima-san…⁉

altTitles.ja: シャンピニオンの魔女

description.en: Luna, a black witch who lives quietly in a poisonous mushroom house, deep in the Black Forest. She lives in the city making high-efficiency medicine, but it is rumored that one will die if touched by her, and thus she is avoided… The life of a witch who doesn't know the warmth of people is carefully and momentarily drawn.
description.pt-br: Luna é uma bruxa que reside serenamente em uma residência de cogumelos venenosos, localizada nas profundezas da Floresta Sombria. Nesse recanto isolado, ela produz remédios que comercializa na cidade em troca dos livros que tanto ama. Contudo, rumores circulam de que qualquer contato com ela resulta em uma terrível morte, levando as pessoas a evitá-la a todo custo... A vida solitária de uma bruxa privada do calor humano é minuciosamente retratada, ao menos por enquanto.

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンの子

description.en: Min is a girl living in poverty. One day, while watching dragons flying in the sky, a dragon egg suddenly falls on her! Min takes the egg home with her, it hatches, and she decides to raise the baby dragon. However, a suspicious human from the military is after the dragon…!?

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

altTitles.pt-br: Você é um Trevo de Quatro Folhas

altTitles.vi: Cậu là cỏ 4 lá

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？
description.pt-br: Uichi já foi um garoto popular e deseja ser um veterinário, porém com o passar do tempo virou alvo de bullying. Então, quando tudo estava sendo horrível, de repente, seu primeiro amor, Yotsuba, aparece em sua frente. Qual será o objetivo dessa linda e corajosa garota que não aparecia a 7 anos?

altTitles.ja: ガールズ×ヴァンパイア

description.en: **Alt Official Raw:** [note](https://note.com/girls_vampire)

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！

description.en: Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja: 「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.vi: Hitori Gotoh chơi guitar từ khi mới học trung học vì giấc mơ tham gia ban nhạc và trở nên nổi tiếng. Nhưng trớ trêu do tính cách hướng nội, rối loạn giao tiếp xã hội của mình mà cô không có một người bạn nào trong suốt những năm tháng cấp hai lên cấp ba. Và rồi, ước mơ đó bắt đầu có cơ sở trở thành hiện thực khi cô gặp Nijika Ijichi, một tay trống đang gấp rút tìm kiếm một người biết chơi guitar cho ban nhạc của mình.
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.tr: Ben, Yvonne, bir Otome oyununda zengin kötü karakter olarak reenkarne oldum. Oyunun hikayesine göre benim gibi herkesin nefret ettiği bir karakter, ana karaktere zorbalık yapmak, onu hoşlanabileceği çeşitli karakterlerin romantik rotalarına sürüklemek gibi bir ana göreve sahip. Ama görünen o ki Elsa’da bir gariplik var, kahraman! Benimle fazla yakınlaşıyor!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

description.en: The cool and spicy Amu Hinamori has graduated from Seiyo Academy's elementary school and is finally a junior high school student! She thought she would have carefree days with her precious friends in junior high... until she is asked to take on a mission related to guardian characters and has to transfer to a new school...!
description.ja: なりたいもう一人の自分である「しゅごキャラ」、そして、聖夜学園小のガーディアンたちと、こころのたまごを守ってきた、クール＆スパイシーな女の子・日奈森あむ。中学生になっても、みんなとの楽しい日々が続く…と思いきや、“アルカナ学園”にいきなり転校が決まって──!? 学園では生徒の「こころのたまご」に次々と×がついているとの噂が……。原因究明のため、あむは、唯世と調査を開始することに！さらに、あむには秘密の使命があって──？

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore ga Kokuhaku Sarete Kara, Ojou no Yousu ga Okashii.

After I Was Confessed to, the Young Lady Looked Strange

altTitles.pt-br: A jovem dama tem agido estranho desde que alguém se confessou para mim

altTitles.id: Perilaku Nona Muda Menjadi Aneh Sejak Seseorang Menyatakan Cinta Padaku

description.en:
The servant of the Tendou family, Eito, serves the perfect young lady, Hoshine. 

One day, Eito informs Hoshine that someone from another class confessed their feelings for him. Hoshine, who has hidden her feelings for Eito since childhood, begins to feel uneasy: 

"I’ve loved Eito for a much longer time!"

 As a result, Hoshine starts to approach Eito even more, making bolder advances than ever before! She gets close to him in crowded trains and begs him to sleep by her side… While Eito tries to maintain his role as a formal servant, Hoshine increasingly pursues him with her advances. 

It’s an adorable romantic comedy between a mistress and her servant, featuring a young lady who strives to win her servant’s love!
description.ja: 天堂家の超ハイスぺお嬢様・星音は、幼い頃からの使用人・影人に想いを寄せていた。ある日、影人が同級生の女子に告白されたのを聞いてしまい…その刹那! 天堂星音のすべて(知力・体力・財力・時の運に第六感?)を使った影人攻略が始まる―――。お嬢が一途にがんばる主従ラブコメ!
description.pt-br: O servo da família Tendou, Eito, serve a jovem perfeita, Hoshine. Um dia, Eito informa a Hoshine que alguém de outra turma confessou seus sentimentos por ele. Hoshine, que esconde seus sentimentos por Eito desde a infância, começa a se sentir inquieta: "Eu amo o Eito há muito mais tempo!" Como resultado, Hoshine começa a se aproximar ainda mais de Eito, fazendo avanços mais ousados do que nunca! Ela se aproxima dele em trens lotados e implora para que ele durma ao seu lado... Enquanto Eito tenta manter seu papel de servo formal, Hoshine o persegue cada vez mais com suas investidas. É uma adorável comédia romântica entre uma jovem dama e seu servo, apresentando uma moça que luta para conquistar o amor de seu fiel criado!

description.en: Nagi Shinonome, known as the "Ice Princess," is a beautiful girl with a cold attitude who does not allow others to get close to her. One day, Souta Minori, who saw her being molested on the train, saved her with all his courage, but the next day she appeared again and said, "I want you to stay by my side." Can Souta continue as friends with the Ice Princess, who only sweetly melts for one person in the world, that is, himself?
description.ja:
その可愛さは、"お友達"のあなただけに。

冷たい態度で他人を寄せ付けない美少女【氷姫】こと東雲凪。ある日、そんな彼女が電車内で痴漢に遭っているのを目撃した俺・海似蒼太は、勇気を振り絞って彼女を助けたのだが、翌日再び彼女が現れて……。

「そばにいて、欲しいんです」

世界でたったひとり、自分にだけ甘く溶けていく【氷姫】と、蒼太は"お友達"であり続けられるのか!?

description.ja: 高校進学を機に、親戚の家に居候することになった男子高校生・大泉将人。良い大学に行くために真面目に勉強したいけど、勝手に家庭教師を名乗り出た“いとこのお姉ちゃん”がセクシーすぎて、全然集中できなくて…!?
description.es-la: Una Comedia Romántica entre Primos, Un chico que apenas comenzó el Instituto y Una Onee-chan que ya va en la Universidad, esto definitivamente te encantará~
description.pt-br: Masato Ooizumi acabou de entrar no ensino médio e se encontra morando com um parente. Vivendo lá está sua "prima irmã mais velha", que está sendo próxima demais dele!?

description.en:
Ever thought, what if jjk characters were swapped with completely unrelated ones ? if the answer’s yes, then I guess my 'manga' is worth checking out. This story happens after the 2 act of doki doki literature club, just after sayori's death.
(This manga is heavely inspired by jujutsu kaisen, gege akutami's manga and it represent doki doki literature club's characters).

altTitles.pt-br: Aulas de luta de primeira classe

description.en:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!
description.pt-br: Kim Jaehyuk é um estudante do ensino médio que vive em desespero sob o tormento dos valentões. Ele é bom nos estudos, mas preferiria ser bom na luta. Então, o destino põe um "tutor de luta" em sua vida!

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.fr:
Certains joueurs vont jusqu’à miser leur propre vie. Pour garantir l’intégrité de ces paris mortels, une puissante organisation nommée « Kakerou » arbitre les jeux en tant que partie neutre. Suivez Baku Madarame, alias Usogui (Le Mangeur de Mensonges), qui affronte des adversaires fous dans des jeux comme « S’échapper du Bâtiment Abandonné », « Le Pouilleux » ou « Le Pendu », dans le but ultime de prendre le contrôle de Kakerou.

---

**Liens:**  
- [Nautiljon](https://www.nautiljon.com/mangas/usogui.html)
- [Infos sur L'OAV](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

description.en: A mundane office worker gets thrown into a danmei novel and becomes the protagonist's cold Master. Intially, he only wanted to spend the rest of his life peacefully, but unexpectedly, it turns out that every single character has unusual feelings for this Master?! What happened to falling in love with the protagonist?!

altTitles.ja: メアヘイム

description.en:
Rotten fruit returns to the branch, and gold drips down like water, A land where events beyond reason occur, a land known as “Meichi” that easily claims the lives of those who dare to enter.
The scholar "Ren" arrives in this godforsaken land to save his sick younger brother. Together with the guide "Tobia", "Ren" embarks on a perilous journey to obtain the “panacea,” an ancient relic of “Meichi.”

A genuine dark fantasy brought to you by "Tsurubuchi Kenji", creator of “Touge Oni,” and "Konata", a rising star of the spanish comic world.
description.ja: 腐った果実が枝へと還り、黄金は水のように滴り落ちる。条理を超えた事象が起こり、踏み入る者の命を容易に奪う土地、“冥地”。学者のレンは、病気の弟を救うため、この神の御手なき地へとやってくる。案内人のトビアと共に、レンはその命を懸けて“冥地”の遺物である「万能薬」を手に入れる旅に挑むことに――。『峠鬼』の鶴淵けんじと、スペイン漫画界が誇る新世代作家・Konataが贈る、本格ダーク・ファンタジー！

altTitles.ja: 赤いペガサス

description.en: Akaba Ken is a top-rank stock-car driver who was involved in a horrific accident, which killed 6 spectators. He was badly hurt, but he survived and promised his younger sister that he would give up racing. He goes to America to help his father develop a new Formula 1 racer, but in the testing of the car runs at speeds that set records – so the pressure is on for him to return to racing, this time in the F-1 circuit. He has supporters, but there are also those who don’t want him to come back, including those who caused the original crash…

title.en: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King

altTitles.en: The Survival Story of the Sword King in Another World

altTitles.ru: История выживания короля меча в фэнтезийном мире

altTitles.ja: 異世界剣王生存記

altTitles.th: การเอาชีวิตรอดของราชาดาบในต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Survival Story of a Sword King in a Fantasy World

altTitles.pt-br: Latna Saga: A Jornada do Rei Espadachim

altTitles.it: Latna Saga: Sopravvivenza di un Re della Spada in un Altro Mondo

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLzbAKkDpYM)
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%84-%EA%B2%80%EC%99%95-%EC%83%9D%EC%A1%B4%EA%B8%B0/2363)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81/103)
- [Official Brazilian Portuguese Translation](https://br.comikey.com/comics/latna-saga-a-jornada-do-rei-espadachim-webtoon/429/)
description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.pt-br:
“Por que esse sistema maldito não me deixa passar do nível 5?!”

Ryu Hanbin era só uma pessoa comum que havia acabado de ser dispensado do serviço militar obrigatório quando foi levado para outro mundo. Deixado para morrer sozinho, ele continuou com o objetivo de sobreviver e ficar mais forte em um mundo repleto de monstros. O problema é que o Tutorial, que deveria ser o seu sistema de ajuda para sobreviver nesse mundo, está repleto de erros.

---

**Links:**
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%84-%EA%B2%80%EC%99%95-%EC%83%9D%EC%A1%B4%EA%B8%B0/2363)
- [Tradução Oficial em Português](https://br.comikey.com/comics/latna-saga-a-jornada-do-rei-espadachim-webtoon/429/)
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!

description.en: Qi, swords, martial artists… and robots and spaceships?! The year is 3077, thousands of years after the heyday of the martial arts realm. Humanity inhabits the stars, governed by interstellar martial arts organizations who kept the old ways of the realm alive: might makes right! For bounty hunters like Seryeong, Robert, and Sunja, this means trouble is good for business, except when they bite off more than they can chew. After venturing to the irradiated wasteland of Earth for a top bounty, only to find a 2,000-year-old martial artist instead, they realize their fortunes are about to change…

altTitles.en: The Wolf Eaten by Little Red Riding Hood

altTitles.ja: 赤ずきんに食べられた狼

description.en:
The Adorable, Adorable Wolf Was Eaten by Little Red Riding Hood...?!

Luca, a wolf who only wanted to scare Little Red Riding Hood, somehow ended up having her words mistaken for a love confession—and was promptly ‘eaten’! But to make matters worse, Little Red Riding Hood is a true carnivore?! As Luca gets completely overwhelmed in this strange relationship, what will happen when the full moon rises...?

A heartwarming and thrilling yuri fairy-tale comedy filled with romance and healing!

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/赤ずきんに食べられた狼（1）-コンパスコミックス-椎名晴美-ebook/dp/B09775BP43

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.ja: サチとユーカ

description.en: Sachi and Yuka, friends from college, are housemates and partners. Yuka, who is free-spirited, and Sachi, who tends to underestimate herself. A romantic comedy of two working adults who have opposite personalities.
description.ja: 大学からの友人同士のサチとユーカは同居人でパートナー。自由奔放なユーカと自分を過小評価しがちなサチ。性格は真逆だけどお互いが何より大事な２人の社会人百合ラブコメ！

altTitles.vi: Thế Giới sau ngày Diệt Vong

altTitles.pt-br: O Mundo Após a Queda

description.en:
Faced with imminent defeat and certain death, would you choose to run – or continue to fight for a doomed world?

When mysterious towers appear across the world, summoning monsters that prey on mankind, this is the choice presented to the Tower Walkers – adventurers with special powers to fight the monsters.

On the brink of death, they can choose to use a “regression stone” to return to the past for a second chance, though this decision places them in a separate timeline forever.

Stubborn Tower Walker Jaehwan rejects this choice, choosing to fight for the original timeline, and learning shocking secrets about the Tower along the way.
description.ko:
<전지적 독자 시점> 싱숑 작가 원작.

이것은 모두가 과거로 돌아갈 때 마지막까지 회귀하지 않았던 한 사나이의 이야기다.
description.pt-br: Esta é a história de um homem que não voltou quando todos retornaram ao passado. Os humanos foram convocados de repente para se tornarem “Andarilhos” e precisavam limpar a torre para salvar o mundo… 77º Andar: A Pedra do Retorno foi descoberta. Andarilhos podiam agora retornar ao passado. Lentamente, todos foram embora… A última esperança da humanidade, “Carpe Diem”, foi formada com as pessoas que se recusaram a abandonar o mundo… O último Andarilho chegou ao 100º andar. Ele não sabia mais no que crer. Obs.: Essa é a adaptação da novel que existe dentro da novel/manhwa Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint e que o protagonista lê em sua juventude.

altTitles.ja: 竜人の隣人

description.en:
A female college student, Himesaki Toko, suddenly finds herself living next door to a new neighbor — Hon, an exchange student who also happens to be a dragon person.

Despite her divine appearance, Hon is clumsy and absent-minded, and Toko just can’t bring herself to ignore her.

Thus begins a laid-back fantasy comedy about cross-cultural exchange, set in a student dorm!
description.ja:
女子大生・姫崎塔子のおとなりに、竜人の留学生・ホンさんが越してきた。
見た目の神々しさとは裏腹に、そそっかしくてうっかり屋なホンさんと、放っておけない塔子ちゃん。
学生寮でゆるっと始まる、ファンタジー異文化交流コメディー！

altTitles.vi: Trở Thành Vương Giả Sau Khi Bị Cắn

altTitles.th: ขึ้นเป็นราชาหลังจากถูกกัด

altTitles.ja: 王者の帰還〜ヴァンパイアの世界に君臨せよ〜

altTitles.vi: Bị Cắn Thành Vương Giả

description.en:
After rebirth, the world has changed. The blood race has become the master of the world, and humans have completely accepted this life and are proud to be blood dependents, as the saying goes: humans who have not been sucked by the blood race are not good humans.

Wang Zhe wanted to repair the regrets left in his previous life and make a better life, but unexpectedly, he was involved in all kinds of events competing for the quota of blood family members. At the critical moment of life and death, a mysterious force in Wang Zhe's body revived. The blood families, real masters and real kings came!

title.en: A Tactical Genius on the Field

altTitles.pt-br: Um Gênio Tático em Campo

description.en: If there is one thing that Ma Jungwoo is good at, it's football. Although he is a genius strategist, others look down on him because of his lack of education and debt. But things seem to turn around when he finds out he has just inherited his late grandfather's British football team. He plans to sell the team and start fresh, only to find out the team has massive debt! Left with no other choice, Jungwoo must use his tactical genius to help this team rise from the ashes and be number one!
description.pt-br: Se tem uma coisa em que Ma Jungwoo é bom, é futebol. Embora seja um estrategista genial, outros o desprezam por sua falta de educação e dívidas. Mas as coisas parecem mudar quando ele descobre que acabou de herdar o time de futebol britânico de seu falecido avô. Ele planeja vender o time e começar do zero, mas descobre que o time tem uma dívida enorme! Sem outra escolha, Jungwoo precisa usar sua genialidade tática para ajudar o time a ressurgir das cinzas e se tornar o número um!

title.en: Muhyo & Roji's Bureau of Supernatural Investigation

altTitles.en: Muhyo & Roji's Bureau of Supernatural Investigation
Muhyo and Roojii’s Magical Law Consultation Office

altTitles.ja-ro: Muhyo to Rooji no Mahouritsusoudan Jimusho
Muhyo to Roujii no Mahouritsu Soudan Jimusho

altTitles.es: Muhyo y Rouji: Bufete de Investigación Sobrenatural

altTitles.ja: ムヒョとロージーの魔法律相談事務所

altTitles.en: Muhyo & Roujii’s Magic Law Consultation Office

altTitles.ja-ro: Muhyo to Rouji no Mahouritsu Soudan Jimusho
Muhyo to Roji no Mahouritsu Soudan Jimusho

description.en: Are you a victim of unwanted spirit possession? Is there a ghost you need sent up and away…or down to burn for all eternity? If the answer is yes, then you need Muhyo and Roji, experts in magic law. Serving justice to evil spirits is their specialty.

altTitles.ja: ジャイアントキリング

description.en:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.
description.pt-br: Giant Killing é um mangá que conta a história de um técnico de futebol, ex-jogador japonês, que luta para levar times amadores à vitória contra times campeões. Tatsumi Takeshi jogava profissionalmente no East Tokyo United, o ETU, e era louvado pelos torcedores por dar tudo de si e levar o time à vitória. Certo dia decide sair do Japão para treinar um time amador Europeu, e desde então é considerado “traidor” por alguns japoneses. Então, dois membros da equipe do ETU vão atrás do técnico para que ele treine o time onde um dia foi jogador, para tirar o time do fundo do poço.

altTitles.ja: イセイカイテンセイ
異星界転星

description.en:
Noah, the last survivor from Earth, aims for a new universe on the spaceship that was handed down to him by his mother who was a scientist. What he arrives at is a planet where living things possess magic. When he is out doing field work, he meets a girl who proclaims herself as the demon lord's daughter.  
  
The cyborg youth will traverse a planet full of mysteries in this iseikai sci-fi fantasy.

altTitles.ja: ファンタジスタ

description.en: Teppei Sakamoto is a boy living in the countryside. He loves soccer, and all his soccer skills were taught to him by his sister. Finally, his sister wants him to join the Mizumoto High School soccer team. Teppei's turn in life has come!! How will this soccer newbie fare in his new environment?

altTitles.ja: ヴェルバーサーガ

description.en: Long ago, A race of beings known as the Vaelber, brought forth by our very own research, dealt a devastating blow to humanity. In the midst of this now declining civilization, Jum, the daughter of a warrior known as Katara, has been living in the wastelands. Ordered by her father to go to the site of an enormous lightning strike, she finds a gigantic crater and some ruins. There, a holographic woman named Gaia materializes, and entrusts Jum with wearing majestic armor known as "Magicraft". Thus begins the battle for the survival of the human race...

altTitles.ja: 百瀬アキラの初恋破綻中。

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love Is Coming Apart.

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés du premier amour de Momose Akira.

altTitles.pt-br: O Primeiro Amor de Momose Akira em Ruínas

altTitles.ru: Первая любовь Акиры Момосе терпит крах.

altTitles.es: El primer amor de Momose Akira se derrumba.

altTitles.vi: Mối tình đầu đầy trắc trở của Momose Akira
Mối Tình Đầu Của Akira Momose Đang Trên Bờ Vực Đổ Vỡ

description.en: Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire. Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach. And there was a "fate" that was more than he could have imagined.
description.es:
Kugayama Hajime, un chico que vive en el campo, se reencuentra con su antigua compañera de clase Momose Akira, a la que solía admirar.

Justo cuando está a punto de observarla desde lejos y disfrutar de su agridulce juventud, Akira se acerca de forma inesperada.

Y el "destino" es mucho más de lo que él pudo haberse imaginado.
description.fr: Kugayama Hajime, un garçon vivant à la campagne, revient vers son ancien camarade de classe Momose Akira, qu'il avait l'habitude d'admirer.Alors qu'il s'apprête à la regarder de loin et à profiter de sa jeunesse aigre-douce, Akira fait une approche inattendue.Et il y a eu un « destin » qui a été plus que ce qu'il aurait pu imaginer.
description.ja: ド田舎に暮らす少年・久我山はじめのもとに帰ってきた、かつての憧れの同級生・百瀬アキラ。彼女を遠くから眺めて、甘酸っぱい青春を謳歌しよう…と思っていた矢先に、アキラからまさかのアプローチが。そしてそこには、想像以上の”運命”が拡がってました。2人の様子を、どうぞあったかく見守ってください。
description.pl: Kugayama Hajime, chłopiec mieszkający na wsi, spotyka swoją dawną koleżankę z klasy, Momose Akiry, którą podziwiał. Gdy tylko zamierza obserwować ją z daleka i cieszyć się swoją słodko-gorzką młodością, Akira niespodziewanie zbliża się do niego. A za tym kryło się „przeznaczenie”, którego nie mógł sobie nawet wyobrazić.
description.ru: Жизнь Хадзимэ Кугаямы, мальчишки из глухой деревушки, круто меняется, когда в его жизнь возвращается бывшая одноклассница и когда-то недосягаемая мечта — Акира Момосэ. Он планировал просто наблюдать за ней издалека и наслаждаться воспоминаниями о своей юности... Но неожиданно Акира делает первый шаг навстречу. И вот тут начинается нечто гораздо большее, чем он мог себе представить. Следите за их историей и согревайте свои сердца вместе с ними.
description.tr: Taşrada yaşayan bir çocuk olan Kugayama Hajime’nin, eskiden hayranlık duyduğu sınıf arkadaşı Momose Akira geri döner. Tam onu uzaktan izleyip tatlı ekşi gençliğinin tadını çıkarmak üzereyken, Akira beklenmedik bir yaklaşımda bulunur. Ve hayal edebileceğinden de öte bir “kader” ile karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: Kugayama Hajime é um jovem que vive no interior. Sua vida muda quando Momose Akira, uma antiga colega de escola por quem ele sempre foi apaixonado, retorna à cidade. Hajime planejava admirá-la de longe, saboreando um romance juvenil agridoce. Mas, para sua surpresa, Akira toma a iniciativa de se aproximar. O que se desenrola a partir daí é um destino mais surpreendente do que ele jamais poderia ter imaginado.

altTitles.ja: 馬姫様と鹿王子

altTitles.en: The Horse Princess and The Deer Prince

description.en:
Mahoro is a high school girl who loves her teacher.
She studied hard to get her teacher to like her, but as a result, she is now a college student making her debut in a rural area, and is at a loss for what to do with her life for the first time!
What will Mahoro see in the ancient city of Nara?

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/馬姫様と鹿王子-1巻-ヤングキングコミックス-椙下-聖海/dp/4785965088

altTitles.ko: 추방자 식당에 어서 오세요! ~최강 파티에서 추방당한 요리사는 모험자 식당을 개업합니다!~

Welcome to the Cheap Restaurant of Outcasts!

description.en: After getting kicked out of the strongest party, the level 99 chef fulfills his dream of opening an adventurer diner in the countryside.
description.ja: 最強ギルドを追放された料理人・デニス。彼は奴隷少女のアトリエとともに『冒険者食堂』を開店させるのだった。至高の料理スキルを活かした庶民的で温かいデニスの料理は、ちょっとアレな冒険者たちの心と身体を癒やしていくが……。

altTitles.ru: Мой дом — это место волшебной силы

altTitles.ja: 俺の家が魔力スポットだった件 ～住んでいるだけで世界最強～

altTitles.zh-hk: 原来我家是魔力点~只是住在那里就变成世界最强~

altTitles.ko: 우리 집이 마력스팟이었던 건에 대하여 ~살고 있는 것만으로 세계최강~

altTitles.pt-br: Minha casa está em um ponto mágico de poder, por morar lá eu me tornei o mais forte do mundo

altTitles.en: My House Is a Magic Power Spot: Just by Living There I Become the Strongest in the World

description.en:
Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
___
**Storyboarder:** [Oomine](https://mangadex.org/author/3a2b2fed-9cc9-4538-b2ca-1d563370316f)
**Character Designer:** [Nabeshima Tetsuhiro](https://mangadex.org/author/9badc86b-f0ba-4f08-bc11-323ea16aae00)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/34698)
description.ja: 自宅でのんびりすることが、最強への近道だった――。強力な魔力スポットの上に建つ一軒家に住んでいた普通の青年ダイチ。 ある日、それを狙うやつらに家ごと異世界に召喚されてしまう!!　だが、長年魔力スポットに住み続け、魔力が貯めこまれたダイチは敵を一蹴！　さらにかわいい我が家の精霊サクラも現れて至れり尽くせり！　最強の魔力を持ったダイチが望むものはただ一つ――それは自宅で平穏に暮らすこと！
description.ru:
Жить беззаботно в своём доме — это, несомненно, великолепно. Но мой дом — самое большое в мире место волшебной силы. Каким-то образом вышло так, что меня с моим домом перенесло в другой мир. Выяснилось, что меня призвали какие-то парни, которые хотели присвоить магию моего дома себе. Тем не менее, я живу в этом месте в течение многих лет, и мое тело, по-видимому, аномально переполнено магией. Из-за каких-то непредвиденных обстоятельств те ребята, которые меня вызвали, быстро убежали. Как бы то ни было, все ещё есть невоспитанные люди, которые жаждут магии, просачивающейся из моего дома. Я не отдам свой дом никому! Я буду использовать свою силу, как захочу!   

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5915da/) (Raw)
description.es-la: Vivir sin preocupaciones en casa es el mejor atajo: mi casa es el mayor punto de poder mágico del mundo. Siendo ese el caso, tanto mi casa como yo fuimos invocados a otro mundo. Sin embargo, he estado viviendo en este lugar durante muchos años y aparentemente mi cuerpo está desbordado magia. Debido a circunstancias imprevistas por parte de los tipos que me invocaron, huyeron rápidamente. Como sea, todavía hay algunas personas mal educadas que codician la magia que escapa de mi casa. ¡No voy a ceder mi casa a esas personas! ¡Voy a ejercer mi poder como me plazca!
description.pt-br: Viver despreocupado em casa é a melhor coisa... minha casa é o maior ponto de força mágica do mundo. Sendo esse o caso, tanto minha casa quanto eu fomos convocados para outro mundo por algumas pessoas que estavam visado isso. No entanto, eu moro neste lugar há muitos anos e meu corpo está, aparentemente, transbordando de forma anormal com a magia. Devido a algumas circunstâncias imprevistas por aquelas pessoas que me chamaram, elas rapidamente fugiram. Seja como for, ainda há algumas pessoas mal-educadas que cobiçam a magia que vaza da minha casa. Eu não vou desistir da minha casa para essas pessoas! Vou usar meu poder como quiser!

altTitles.ja: 落日のパトス

description.en:
What happens when next door to upcoming mangaka Fujiwara moves Yuuki, who was his teacher back in high school and first crush?

Yuuki, now a married woman, is starting a new life in the city, however her husband is always away on business trips. She finds comfort in the company of her former student, but what she doesn't realize is that Fujiwara can listen to everything happening in her apartment through the building's thin walls...
description.ja: 東京。繁華街から離れた閑静な住宅街で連載漫画家を目指す青年・藤原秋。ある日、隣の部屋に新たな住人が引っ越してきた。その隣人は藤原の高校の恩師・仲井間真。偶然の再会に喜ぶ二人。しかしその晩。藤原は耳にする。隣の部屋から漏れる、仲井間の嬌声。自らの欲望を抑えられず、藤原は隣室を覗き込む。そこにはかつての恩師のあられもない姿が…!?隣人愛欲物語。淫靡の世界の幕がいま、開く。

altTitles.ja: あさこ

altTitles.vi: Asako

description.en: The challenged relationship between Masashi Aoshima, an 11-year-old boy living in a seaside fishing village, and Asako, a mysterious beauty from Tokyo who came to stay at his guest house.
description.ja: 令和元年、8月。実家へ帰るための新幹線の中、青島将司は少年時代の淡い記憶を回顧し始める。平成八年、夏。海沿いの田舎で暮らす小学5年生の少年、マサシ。気弱な性格でいじめられっ子の彼は素性不明の美女・あさこと出会う。彼女の大胆な行動に翻弄される中、マサシの心は大きくざわめいていき…!?

title.en: Training Regimes of the World’s Strongest Women

altTitles.ja: 最強女師匠たちが育成方針を巡って修羅場

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou Onna Shishou-tachi ga Ikusei Houshin o Megutte Shuraba
Saikyou Onna Shishou-tachi ga Ikusei Houshin wo Megutte Shuraba

The Strongest Female Masters, Who Are Trying to Raise Me Up, Are in Shambles Over Their Training Policy

altTitles.th: เหล่าอาจารย์สาวสุดแกร่งแย่งกันจะปั้นให้ผมเทพ

description.en:
There are three female masters who are known to be the strongest in the world. The only thing they can’t get their hands on… their ideal man.

“If there are no ideal men, why not raise one ourselves!?”

As they skim over the list of candidates, the ladies' eyes all fixate on one boy. A level 0 with no shred of talent…
___
**Character Designer:** [Tajima Ryuushi](https://mangadex.org/author/3ac15f57-6a12-4018-b549-30aab86fc6c8)
description.ja: 世界最強クラスと称される三人の女傑。そんな彼女たちでも手に入らないモノ……それは―――理想の男！！「好みの男がいないなら、自分で育てりゃいいじゃない！」弟子――もとい、未来の旦那候補として彼女たちが目をつけたのは…才能の欠片もないレベル　0　の少年で…！？

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略

altTitles.zh: 孤單一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.zh-ro: Duzi Yi Ren De Yi Shijie Gonglüe

altTitles.zh-hk: 獨自一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.th: นายโดดเดี่ยวพิชิตต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Lonely Attack on the Different World

altTitles.vi: Hành Trình Cô Độc Nơi Dị Giới

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.vi: Câu chuyện theo chân Haruka - một cậu học sinh trung học mọt sách cô độc, đột nhiên bị triệu hồi đến dị giới với đám bạn học. Không giống như cả lớp nhận được các kỹ năng cheat đủ để làm bá chủ tại thế giới khác, nhân vật chính của chúng ta phải ôm theo bảng trạng thái phế vật mà lăn lộn hòng sống sót. Vậy thì, hãy cùng dõi theo và cổ vũ cho Haruka có thể tai qua nạn khỏi, vươn đến đỉnh cao mà không cần tới cheat trong câu chuyện tràn đầy hài hước này nhé.
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

title.en: Murder Lock: School of the Killing

altTitles.ja-ro: MURDER LOCK - SCHOOL OF THE XXXXXXX

altTitles.ru: Головорезы под замком: школа для убийц

altTitles.ja: マーダーロック-殺人鬼の凶室

description.en:
Kotaro Kudo was known as the "Streets' Strongest". Once, 13 thugs, thirsty for revenge, kidnapped his younger sister Hinami. Kotaro beat everyone, and on the same night, he was arrested on suspicion of murder, as each of them was later found dead. He is then forcefully enrolled to a certain school, in which all students must meet "a special criteria" to enter…  
  


---
description.ru:
Добро пожаловать в нелепый мир, где нет места морали.  
  
Котаро Кудо был известен как «сильнейший на улице». Как-то раз 13 жаждущих мести отморозков похитили его младшую сестру. Котаро разнёс всех, а в скором времени был арестован по подозрению в убийстве, так как каждого из них обнаружили мёртвым. И теперь Котаро отправляют в некую школу, ученики которой должны соответствовать «ряду особых критериев». В школу, где собраны лишь самые отъявленные несовершеннолетние негодяи.  
  
Начинаем историю о выживании в школе повергающих в трепет убийств!
