altTitles.ja: Fate/Grand Order コミックアラカルト PLUS!　SP　対決編！

description.en: Anthology of "one-shot" manga drawn by various artists and centered around battles between the Servants of Fate/Grand Order.
description.fr: Anthologie de mangas "one-shot" dessinés par divers artistes et centrés autour de combats opposant les Servants de Fate/Grand Order.

altTitles.ja: 遊☆戯☆王
遊戯王

altTitles.th: เกมกลคนอัจฉริยะ

altTitles.vi: Vua Trò Chơi

altTitles.pt-br: O Rei dos Jogos

description.en: Sitting by himself in the back of the class, 10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle, an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years, the King of Games possesses Yugi, recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games, where the stakes are high, and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!
description.pt-br: O estudante Yugi Mutou passou a maior parte de seu tempo sozinho jogando jogos - até que ele resolveu o Enigma do Milênio, um artefato egípcio misterioso! Possuída pelo quebra-cabeça, Yugi se torna o Yu-Gi-Oh(O Rei dos Jogos), e irá enfrentar os desafios dos Jogos das Sombras - Jogos mortais com grandes apostas e altos riscos, como apostar a sua alma e a alma de seus queridos amigos! O mangá contém novas histórias não vistas no anime, incluindo a origem de Yugi e seus amigos!

altTitles.ja: バクシンお嬢様道！

description.en: Sakuraba Sakurako is at the entrance ceremony of Neo Mogitori Academy, a school for training young ladies. She tries to enter the school with a dog as her companion, but the teacher stops her and she ends up fighting the dog. Sakurako narrowly wins the battle and meets the boys and girls who will work hard together to become the ultimate ojou-sama.
A collection of Twitter shorts posted under the pen姉 (@pensis_x) account.

altTitles.ja: うさぎはかく語りき

description.en: The city of Shibugaya was once known for its youth and bustle, however now, all that remains are ruins since man-eating rabbits have made a nest of its subway... One wolf-eared girl dares to challenge the underground with by her side a girl with rabbit ears...
description.ja: かつての若者と混沌の街として知られた渋ヶ谷。しかし今は地下に巣くった"人喰いうさぎ"たちによって廃墟の街と化していた…。その地下に挑む狼耳の少女・イズコ。彼女の傍らにはうさぎ耳の少女も…。

altTitles.pt-br: O começo após o final
O começo depois do fim

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

altTitles.ja: ベイビー車中ハッカーズ

description.en:
“School is a bit suffocating.”
16-year-old high school girl Yonagi Fuji lives and sleeps in her car, but only in the backyard of her house because she doesn't have a driver's license. She wants to sleep in her car wherever she likes. Then, she meets a cheery girl from the same school who has a driver's license, Ichinose Asahi?

A story that, if you read it, you'll definitely want to sleep in your car!? The curtain opens on a new and exciting high school girl × car-sleeping hobby life manga!!

altTitles.en: I Made a Contract With Myself

description.en: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

altTitles.es: El Primer Amor del Príncipe Heredero

description.en: The flawless Prince Nazaire changes schools in hopes of wooing a bride… only to encounter the tyrant Cassius Li! At first, the two cannot stand one another, as they constantly infuriate each other. Yet between ball dances, rescues, and secret rendezvous, Nazaire and Cassius begin seeing each other for who they truly are. But love between a prince and a commoner could never happen, and if Nazaire hopes to ascend the throne, he will have to give up Cassius. Torn between love and duty, can the prince and tyrant reach their happily ever after?
description.es: Para consolidar su posición el príncipe heredero lanzó un ataque en busca de cierta persona rica. Pero pronto sufrió la primera crítica de su vida: el matón del campus declaró que era amigo de esa persona y le quería proteger. Luego, fue golpeado por un segundo ataque crítico: durante el día se enfrentaba contra el matón, pero todas las noches, ¡tenía intimidad con el matón en sus sueños! Todo parece estar fuera de control ¿Cómo debería el príncipe heredero, quien nunca se había equivocado, enfrentarse a su inesperado primer amor?

altTitles.ja: 孤児院テイマー

description.ar:
بعد أن أعيد إحيائه في عالم آخر لموته بسبب كبر العمر، بطل قصتنا "شو" يعيش الآن في ميتم فقير، فيقرر المغامرة كل يوم لأجل مساعدة الميتم، ولتوفير الأكل لأخته وأصدقائه، بالإستعانة بالمهارات التي اكتسبها .  
والآن يعيش حياة عادية هو والبقية ووحوشه الظريفة.
description.en:
Shu, who died of old age, reincarnated as a baby in a different world where he was picked up by a poor orphanage. He quickly grows up under the watchful eye of the gentle director and staff. With skills received from God, he starts to exert talent…
He now lives at his own pace, adventuring with cute monsters and good friends ♪

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5081ed/) (jp)

title.en: Fukushuu wo Koinegau Saikyou Yuusha wa, Yami no Chikara de Senmetsu Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: 復讐を希う最強勇者は、闇の力で殲滅無双する

altTitles.ja-ro: Fukushuu o Koinegau Saikyou Yuusha ha, Yami no Chikara de Senmetsu Musou Suru

altTitles.en: The Strongest Hero Who Longs for Revenge Will Peerlessly Annihilate with the Power of Darkness
The Hero Who Seeks Revenge Shall Exterminate with Darkness
The Dark Massacre of the Vengeful Hero

altTitles.zh-hk: 渴望復仇的最強勇者、以黑暗之力所向披靡

altTitles.ru: Герой, жаждущий мести, уничтожит врагов Силой Тьмы

altTitles.es-la: La oscura masacre del héroe vengativo

description.en:
Raoul, who had defeated the demon king as the strongest hero, should have become the savior of the world. Having his treasured companions and family killed by power-hungry aristocrats, he was executed with false charges brought against him by the princess. Just before his life collapsed, at last, his heart fell into darkness.

"I'll tear those traitors from limb to limb. Burn them at the stake. Sever them to pieces. Skewer them. I'll kill every one of those bastards without mercy and make them taste hell's suffering......!!!"

Obtaining the power of darkness, Raoul was revived. Sneering, he vowed revenge. "Oh, I'm looking forward to it – from now on, I'll bask in their blood as I please." Several days after the hero's revival in the imperial capital where flowers bloomed in profusion, the parade that would advance towards tragedy began.
___
**Storyboarder:** [Hanji](https://mangadex.org/author/ce336432-7da7-45a0-bcdd-523cc0e5c3e5)
**Character Designer:** [Araya](https://mangadex.org/author/01944b4f-2580-447d-9e18-9b1eac224beb)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39335)
description.fr: Raul qui avait vaincu le roi démon et reconnu comme étant le héros le plus fort aurait dû devenir le sauveur du monde. Mais ses chers compagnons et sa famille ont été tués par des aristocrates affamés de pouvoir, et lui exécuté suite à de fausses accusations portées contre lui par la princesse. Juste avant que sa vie ne s'effondre, son cœur tomba finalement dans les ténèbres. "Je déchirerai ces traîtres de membre en membre. Brûlez-les sur le bûcher. Coupez-les en morceaux. Embrochez-les. Je tuerai tous ces salauds sans pitié et je leur ferai goûter les souffrances de l'enfer…. ! ! ! !" ! Ayant obtenu le pouvoir des ténèbres, Raul fut ressuscité. En tout ricanant, il jura de se venger. "Oh, j'ai hâte d'y être - à partir de maintenant, je me prélasserai dans leur sang comme il me plaira." Quelques jours après la renaissance du héros, dans la capitale impériale où les fleurs fleurissaient à profusion, le défilé qui allait mener vers la tragédie débuta.
description.ja: 最強の勇者として魔王を倒したラウルは、世界の救世主となる――はずだった。私利私欲を貪る貴族たちにより、仲間や家族を殺されたラウルは、偽りの罪で処刑される。命が潰えるその直前、ついに彼の心は悪に墜ちた。……あの裏切り者どもを、火炙りにして殺す。八つ裂きにして殺す。串刺しにして殺す。地獄のような苦しみの中で、憎き者たちを全員容赦なく殺してやる……!!!!　闇の力を手に入れ蘇生を果たしたラウルは、復讐を誓い、嗤う。「ああ、たのしみだな。――これからあいつらの血を、思う存分浴びることができる」　勇者の復活から数日後。花の咲き乱れる王都で、残虐を極めた復讐無双がはじまるのだった――。

title.en: Taida na Akujoku Kizoku ni Tensei shita Ore, Scenario wo Bukkowashitara Kikakugai no Maryoku de Saikyou ni Natta

altTitles.ja: 怠惰な悪辱貴族に転生した俺、シナリオをぶっ壊したら規格外の魔力で最凶になった

altTitles.ja-ro: Taida na Akujoku Kizoku ni Tensei shita Ore, Scenario o Bukkowashitara Kikakugai no Maryoku de Saikyou ni Natta
Taidana Akuhazukashime Kizoku ni Tensei Shita Ore, Scenario wo Bukkowashitara Kikaku Gai No Maryoku de Saikyou ni Natta

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as the Lazy and Villainous Noble, I Broke the Scenario and Became the Most Formidable With Extraordinary Magic

altTitles.pt-br: Reencarnado como o Nobre Preguiçoso e Vilão, Quebrei o Cenário e Me Tornei o Mais Formidável com Magia Extraordinária

altTitles.uk: Я перевтілився у Дворянина-Лиходія, проте змінив сценарій і став найбільш грізним магом

altTitles.vi: chuyển sinh thành quý tộc phản diện và lười biếng, tôi trở thành kẻ mạnh nhất học viện

description.en:
I've been reincarnated as the villainous noble Weiss from my favorite academy game, and the fate that awaits me is nothing but the worst possible ruin, with no salvation. I absolutely have to avoid that at all costs! Then the only way out is to gain overwhelming power that even surpasses the game's protagonist and become the strongest!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/69646)
description.ja:
大好きな学園ゲームに登場する悪役貴族・ヴァイスに転生してしまった、やがてこの身に待ち受けるのは、救いなしの最悪な破滅エンド。

それだけはなんとしてでも回避したい！

だったらこのゲームの主人公すら遠く及ばない、圧倒的な力を身につけて最強になるしかない！

最凶成り上がり異世界学園ファンタジーコミカライズ!
description.vi: Tôi đã tái sinh vào vai một quý tộc phản diện tên Weiss trong game học viện mà tôi thích nhất, và số phận chờ đợi tôi chẳng khác nào thảm họa tồi tệ nhất, không có lối thoát. Tôi nhất định phải tránh điều đó bằng mọi giá! Vậy nên cách duy nhất là có được sức mạnh áp đảo, thậm chí còn vượt xa cả nhân vật chính trong game và trở thành kẻ mạnh nhất!
description.pt-br:
Eu reencarnei como *Weiss*, o nobre que é um vilãozinho secundário do meu jogo favorito, e que está destinado a  própria ruína e morte.

Eu definitivamente preciso evitar isso de qualquer jeito!

Então, o que me sobra é conseguir um poder tão apelão que nem mesmo o protagonista ousará me enfrentar.

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsunomanika Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.vi: Thiên sứ nhà bên

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

altTitles.pl: Anioł z Sąsiedztwa Niezwykle Mnie Rozpieszcza

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

title.en: Dungeon ni Hisomu Yandere na Kanojo ni Ore wa Nando mo Korosareru

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンに潜むヤンデレな彼女に俺は何度も殺される

altTitles.en: My Yandere Girlfriend Lurks in the Dungeon and Kills Me Over and Over Again

altTitles.ko: 던전에 숨어든 얀데레 그녀에게 나는 몇 번이고 죽는다

altTitles.ru: Моя Девушка-Яндере, Прячущаяся в Подземелье, Убивает Меня Снова и Снова

altTitles.vi: Tôi bị bạn gái đâm chết hết lần này đến khác

altTitles.pt-br: Minha namorada Yandere espreita na masmorra e me mata repetidamente

description.en: Kiska, a boy who was mistreated by the villagers, was able to get by thanks to his childhood friend, Namia, who was the only one who stood by him. One day, Namia is found murdered in the village. Kiska is framed for the murder by the other villagers, and banished to an inescapable S-class dungeon...?
description.ja:
何度死んだって、何度倒れたって、やり直す――！

冤罪により脱出不可能な高難易度ダンジョンの奥地へ追放された、なんの変哲もない男・キスカ。絶望する間もなく、突然モンスターに殺されるその寸前、＜セーブ＆リセット＞のスキルが付与されて……！？
description.pt-br: Kiska, um garoto que foi maltratado pelos moradores, conseguiu sobreviver graças à sua amiga de infância, Namia, que foi a única que o apoiou. Um dia, Namia é encontrada assassinada na vila. Kiska é incriminado pelo assassinato pelos outros moradores e banido para uma masmorra de classe S inescapável...?

altTitles.ja: 先輩がうざい後輩の話

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai ga Urusai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About A Junior Who's Annoyed By Her Senior

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Senpai é Irritante

altTitles.vi: Lão Senpai phiền phức của tôi

description.en:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…

Won 1st place in the 2018 Next Manga Awards Web Category.
___

description.fr: Futaba Igarashi est une petite employée de bureau qui trouve que son imposant et turbulent collègue Harumi Takeda lui met toujours des bâtons dans les roues, mais il la soutient toujours, il lui tient toujours compagnie, et elle commence à remarquer que son cœur est lentement en train de pencher vers lui...
description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

altTitles.ja: イケメン男装レイヤーに恋してる!!

altTitles.en: I'm in Love with a Handsome Cosplayer Dressed as a Man

description.en:
Assistant cameraman Osaka Kippei is one day invited to a cosplay event by his coworker where he meets the most handsome man he has ever seen: Ichinose Makoto. And through twists and turns they become friends.

In reality, however, Kippei is mistakenly thinking Makoto is man and Makoto, trying to avoid disappointing Kippei and losing him, is doing her best to act like a man for him. But what are these conflicting feelings they feel!? The mistaken love comedy between Kippei who thinks she's a man and Makoto the handsome crossplayer starts!!
description.ja:
カメラマンアシスタントの大坂桔平は、ある日同僚に誘われて行ったコスプレイベントで今まで見たこともないイケメン・一ノ瀬マコト（女）に出会う。
ひょんなことから友人となったふたりだが、
桔平はマコトを男と勘違いし、マコトは桔平に嫌われたくない一心で
男であることを貫き通そうとしたりと、それぞれの心境は複雑で──!?
マコトを男だと思い込んでいる桔平と男装レイヤーのマコトの勘違いスタートラブコメディ!!

altTitles.vi: Vạn Tra Triêu Hoàng

altTitles.pt-br: Presságio da Fênix

altTitles.th: ชายเลวหมื่นลี้ทานตะวัน

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロイン救済計画

altTitles.es-la: Incontables escorias se arrodillan ante la fénix

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

altTitles.ja: 放課後のシンデレラくん

altTitles.vi: "Chàng" Lọ Lem Sau Giờ Học

description.en:
It's a romantic comedy about the overbearing love between a popular, outgoing boy and a girl who is actually a cross-dressing boy!

---
**Notes:**
- Serialized as [Inaho-kun wa Nise Kanojo no Hazu na no ni](https://mangadex.org/title/52e2bba3-1948-4e65-a282-a73a0b036005/inaho-kun-wa-nise-kanojo-no-hazu-na-no-ni).

title.en: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

altTitles.ja: 王様ランキング

altTitles.pt-br: Ranking dos Reis

altTitles.vi: Bảng xếp hạng Quốc Vương

description.en:
Bojji is a deaf, powerless prince who cannot even wield a children's sword. As the firstborn son, he strives hard and dreams of becoming the world's greatest king. However, people mutter about him behind his back with “a good-for-nothing prince” and “no way he can be king”.
  
Bojji is able to make his first ever friend, “Kage”, a literal shadow on the ground who somehow understands Bojji well. The story follows Bojji's coming of age as he meets various people in his life, starting with his fateful encounter with Kage.
___
**Additional Sites:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/osama_ranking)
description.es:
Bojji es un príncipe sordomudo que vive en un mundo fantástico repleto de criaturas mágicas. Pese a no destacar en nada, y siendo incapaz ni siquiera de empuñar una espadita de niño, sueña con algún día convertirse en el rey más grande del mundo.

La gente lo considera un completo inútil y sin ningún talento para ser rey. Aunque la situación cambia cuando conoce a Kage, una sombra (literalmente) que es uno de los pocos supervivientes de un clan de asesinos y que intenta robarle las pocas pertenencias que Bojji llevaba encima.

De alguna manera, Kage logra comprender al príncipe y se convierte en su primer amigo verdadero, dando así inicio a la aventura que Bojji tanto anhela. Mientras tanto, en la oscuridad, un poder amenaza con devastar al reino.
description.ru: Боддзи удаётся найти своего первого в жизни друга, «Кагэ» — буквально тень на земле, которая каким-то образом хорошо понимает Боддзи. История рассказывает о взрослении Боддзи, о том, как он встречает разных людей в своей жизни, начиная с судьбоносной встречи с Кагэ.
description.vi:
"Bảng xếp hạng Quốc vương" xoay quanh Bojji, một hoàng tử điếc, vô năng, và thậm chí không thể cầm nổi thanh kiếm của một đứa con nít. Là con cả, cậu luôn cố gắng hết mình để tiến tới ước mơ trở thành vị vua vĩ đại nhất thế giới. Thế nhưng, luôn có những kẻ buông lời xì xào bàn tán sau lưng Bojji, bảo cậu là "một thằng hoàng tử bất tài", và "không đời nào có thể trở thành vua được". 

Bojji đã có người bạn đầu tiên của mình, "Kage", một bóng đen trên mặt đất, bằng cách nào đó lại có thể hiểu rõ về cậu. Đây là câu chuyện kể về sự trưởng thành của Bojji khi cậu gặp được những người khác nhau trong cuộc đời mình, bắt đầu từ lần gặp gỡ định mệnh của cậu với Kage.
description.pt-br:
O mangá da web comic gira em torno de Bojji, um príncipe surdo e impotente que não consegue nem empunhar uma espada infantil. Como filho primogênito, ele se esforça muito e sonha em se tornar o maior rei do mundo. No entanto, as pessoas murmuram sobre ele pelas costas como 'um príncipe inútil' e 'de jeito nenhum ele pode ser rei'.

Bojji é capaz de fazer seu primeiro amigo, 'Kage' - literalmente um ser vivo que é uma sombra no chão que de alguma forma entende Bojji bem. A história segue o amadurecimento de Bojji enquanto ele conhece várias pessoas em sua vida, começando com seu fatídico encontro com Kage.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 12, Cap 155. ]

description.en:
Set in U.C. 0084, before Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam, the story follows the Titans Test Team, Black Otter Team, on their mission to test new mobile suits for the Titans. It begins with Eliard Hunter, an Earth Federation mobile suit pilot being assigned to the Titans and transferring to the Aswan, an Alexandria class carrier. There he meets Carl Matsubara, another new Titans recruit, Audrey April a skilled pilot and chief of test operations and data gathering, and Wes Murphy, a veteran of the One Year War and the Delaz Conflict. The Black Otter team doesn’t just carry out test runs, it also participates in real combat missions against Zeon Remnants and later, against AEUG.   
  
Manga adaptation of the photonovel of the same name.
description.pt-br:
Ambientada em U.C. 0084, antes de Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam, a história segue a Equipe de Teste de Titãs, Equipe Black Otter, em sua missão de testar novos trajes móveis para os Titãs. Começa com Eliard Hunter, um piloto de traje móvel da Federação da Terra sendo designado para os Titãs e transferido para o Aswan, um porta-aviões da classe Alexandria. Lá ele conhece Carl Matsubara, outro novo recruta dos Titãs, Audrey April, uma piloto habilidosa e chefe de operações de teste e coleta de dados, e Wes Murphy, um veterano da Guerra de Um Ano e do Conflito de Deraz. A equipe Black Otter não apenas realiza testes, mas também participa de missões de combate reais contra Zeon Remnants e, mais tarde, contra AEUG.   
  
Adaptação em mangá da VisualNovel de mesmo nome.

description.en: I, the earthling "hero" of this story, crossed over into another world based on a video game and suddenly appeared in a villainous female demon's bed when I arrived. If not for the fact that I had married all the villains in the game before crossing over, I'd have been killed pretty quickly. Now, the villains keep pestering me, asking me to help them rule the world, and vying for my hand in marriage. What am I supposed to do? I'll await your answers online! It's urgent!
